SELECT to_char(t1.logout_time, 'HH24') AS label,COUNT (1) AS number FROM( SELECT T .logout_time FROM sys_login_log T WHERE T .logout_time >= to_date('${begin}','yyyy-MM-DD') AND T .logout_time < (to_date('${end}','yyyy-MM-DD')+ integer '1')) t1
GROUP BY label ORDER BY label

SELECT create_time as label, clicks as number FROM log_user_button WHERE user_status ='0' AND create_time >= to_date('${begin}','yyyy-MM-DD') AND create_time < (to_date('${end}','yyyy-MM-DD')+ integer '1')
AND button_number = '${where}'
ORDER BY label

SELECT button_number as label , count(1) as number FROM log_user_button WHERE user_status ='1' AND create_time >= to_date('${begin}','yyyy-MM-DD') AND create_time < (to_date('${end}','yyyy-MM-DD')+ integer '1')
AND tap_order = cast('${where}' as int)
GROUP BY label ORDER BY label

SELECT button_number AS label,SUM(clicks) AS number FROM log_user_button WHERE user_status ='0' AND create_time >= to_date('${begin}', 'yyyy-MM-DD') AND create_time < (to_date('${end}', 'yyyy-MM-DD') + INTEGER '1')
GROUP BY label
